name: Chained Cars Drag Race
description:
Chained Cars Drag Race
Have you ever played any jumping car, chained cars and car 3d games of 2018? Welcome to the Chained Cars Drag Race game with amazing and impossible chained cars environment in futuristic city.
Chained Cars Drag Race Game Play:
The game play of this Chained Cars Drag Race is very thrilling but interesting to play. You will have full control of one car which is chained with other stunt car. Other car will be automatically speed up depending on your control. You have to clear all 5 levels with multiple of difficulties like speed breaker, slope and other futuristic mania.
Chained Cars Drag Race Features:
• Multiple animations and different cars.
• A game of challenges and racing adventure.
• Number of high performance muscle-cars to upgrade.
• Realistic & Stunning colourful HD graphics.
• Impossible car driving missions.
• Break chain on models car.

People have a strong interest to perform crazy, thrilling and furious Limo fantasy stunts by playing chained car stunts impossible games, challenging without chain breaking on dangerous tracks. Perform jumps on impossible tracks with furious speed in city police stunt car drive with best thrilling view and do stunts to avoid obstacle, crates and sports cars 2018.
You might have played many jumping car, car 3d and other chained cars but this Chained Cars Drag Race will offer you Mania traffic with chained cars in amazing environment.
Get ready to drive chained cars against ramp in this Chained Cars Drag Race. Enjoy the thrill of chain cars and the danger of chained cars crash while racing along the impossible tracks. If you like fast driving of joined cars in chained car games, then master your driving skills with furious stunts in car crash simulator 2018.
In this Mania of chained cars, get into the driver seat and face intense challenges. In this racing game, chains have been attached to your mania and your rivals’ car. You are dealing with two joined racing-cars and your first and foremost task is to avoid to full extent to become them unchanged!
If you have interest in chained cars, jumping car and other racing car games then you get prepared for stunts impossible chained car driving and if you sick to play all kinds of parking, action and scientific games so no need to worry, just download impossible tracks chained cars 2018 with impossible driving stunts off road endless adventure game with 3d graphics and fabulous weather.
To become the master of Drag Race with chained cars mania, you need to be a stunt driver in order to win the racing of chained cars, race pedals are not the only key factors in this 3D Chained cars & Traffic Mania game of chains but breaks and controls of car are also more important, chained driving are there to race your cars on to just drive carefully to avoid car accidents.
You need to be a stunt driver in order to win the racing of chained cars, race pedals are not the only key factors in this Chained Cars Drag Race game of chains but breaks and controls of car are also more important, chained driving are there to race your cars.
Enjoy new stunt chained cars stone race on crazy road chain cars driving simulator. Chain cars extreme road racing is one of the best real chain cars drive 2017 from rival chain cars stunt race and thrilling chain cars race.
If you are new to this chained cars game then drive like crazy while overtaking cars & highway speed bike racers and avoid damaging your modern car simulator. Play this drift car crash game to show off your crazy drifting skills and become the champion of this drifting and drag race.

WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK:
Chained Cars Drag Race will be updated according to your suggestions. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
